bDebugDrawWholeCollection: Show debug visualization for the rest of the geometry collection related to the current rigid body id selection.
bDebugDrawHierarchy: Show debug visualization for the top level node rather than the bottom leaf nodes of a cluster's hierarchy. * Only affects Clustering and Geometry visualization.
bDebugDrawClustering: Show debug visualization for all clustered children associated to the current rigid body id selection.
HideGeometry: Geometry visibility setting. Select the part of the geometry to hide in order to better visualize the debug information.
bShowRigidBodyId: Display the selected rigid body's id.
bShowRigidBodyCollision: Show the selected rigid body's collision volume.
bCollisionAtOrigin: Show the selected rigid body's collision volume at the origin, in local space.
bShowRigidBodyTransform: Show the selected rigid body's transform.
bShowRigidBodyInertia: Show the selected rigid body's inertia tensor box.
bShowRigidBodyVelocity: Show the selected rigid body's linear and angular velocity.
bShowRigidBodyForce: Show the selected rigid body's applied force and torque.
bShowRigidBodyInfos: Show the selected rigid body's on screen text information.
bShowTransformIndex: Show the transform index for the selected rigid body's associated cluster nodes.
bShowTransform: Show the transform for the selected rigid body's associated cluster nodes.
bShowParent: Show a link from the selected rigid body's associated cluster nodes to their parent's nodes.
bShowLevel: Show the hierarchical level for the selected rigid body's associated cluster nodes.
bShowConnectivityEdges: Show the connectivity edges for the selected rigid body's associated cluster nodes.
bShowGeometryIndex: Show the geometry index for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bShowGeometryTransform: Show the geometry transform for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bShowBoundingBox: Show the bounding box for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bShowFaces: Show the faces for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bShowFaceIndices: Show the face indices for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bShowFaceNormals: Show the face normals for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bShowSingleFace: Enable single face visualization for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
SingleFaceIndex: The index of the single face to visualize.
bShowVertices: Show the vertices for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bShowVertexIndices: Show the vertex indices for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bShowVertexNormals: Show the vertex normals for the selected rigid body's associated geometries.
bUseActiveVisualization: Adapt visualization depending of the cluster nodes' hierarchical level.
PointThickness: Thickness of points when visualizing vertices.
LineThickness: Thickness of lines when visualizing faces, normals, ...etc.
bTextShadow: Draw shadows under the displayed text.
TextScale: Scale of the font used to display text.
NormalScale: Scale factor used for visualizing normals.
AxisScale: Scale of the axis used for visualizing all transforms.
ArrowScale: Size of arrows used for visualizing normals, breaking information, ...etc.
RigidBodyIdColor: Color used for the visualization of the rigid body ids.
RigidBodyTransformScale: Scale for rigid body transform visualization.
RigidBodyCollisionColor: Color used for collision primitives visualization.
RigidBodyInertiaColor: Color used for the visualization of the rigid body inertia tensor box.
RigidBodyVelocityColor: Color used for rigid body velocities visualization.
RigidBodyForceColor: Color used for rigid body applied force and torque visualization.
RigidBodyInfoColor: Color used for the visualization of the rigid body infos.
TransformIndexColor: Color used for the visualization of the transform indices.
LevelColor: Color used for the visualization of the levels.
ParentColor: Color used for the visualization of the link from the parents.
ConnectivityEdgeThickness: Line thickness used for the visualization of the rigid clustering connectivity edges.
GeometryIndexColor: Color used for the visualization of the geometry indices.
BoundingBoxColor: Color used for the visualization of the bounding boxes.
FaceColor: Color used for the visualization of the faces.
FaceIndexColor: Color used for the visualization of the face indices.
FaceNormalColor: Color used for the visualization of the face normals.
SingleFaceColor: Color used for the visualization of the single face.
VertexColor: Color used for the visualization of the vertices.
VertexIndexColor: Color used for the visualization of the vertex indices.
VertexNormalColor: Color used for the visualization of the vertex normals.
